attributes.action: resign and to call for all the other MP's who have misused the expenses system to also resign thus forcing a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should the members of Gordon Brown's government and all the other MP's be able to misuse the expenses system without any sanctions. If this were a commercial company those caught would at the very least be sacked, if not also arrested by the Police and prosecuted. Instead what we see are MP's saying sorry and paying the money back. The only thing that they are sorry about is that they have been caught out!!

rejection.details:
MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk

There is already a petition calling for an election: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/GoToCountryNow/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
